CodeList.Name: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Self-Reported Version Questionnaire Test Name

Description.TranslatedText: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Self-Reported Version test name.

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: PODCI3-Ability Do Same Things Friends Do
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: PODCI3-Ability Do Same Things Friends Do
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Self-Reported - During the last week, how happy have you been with: Your ability to do the same things your friends do?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PODCI Adolescent Self-Reported Version - Ability Do Same Things Friends Do

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: PODCI3-Able to Do Activities at Home
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: PODCI3-Able to Do Activities at Home
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Self-Reported - As a result of my treatment, I expect: To be able to do activities at home.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PODCI Adolescent Self-Reported Version - Able to Do Activities at Home

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: PODCI3-Able to Do More at School
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: PODCI3-Able to Do More at School

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PODCI Adolescent Self-Reported Version - Able to Do More at School

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Self-Reported - As a result of my treatment, I expect: To be able to do more play or recreational activities.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PODCI Adolescent Self-Reported Version - Able to Do More Play

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Self-Reported - As a result of my treatment, I expect: To be able to do more sports.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PODCI Adolescent Self-Reported Version - Able to Do More Sports

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: PODCI3-Bend Over and Pick Up Something
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: PODCI3-Bend Over and Pick Up Something
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Self-Reported - During the last week, has it been easy or hard for you to: Bend over from a standing position and pick up something off the floor?

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Self-Reported - During the last week, has it been easy or hard for you to: Bicycle or tricycle?

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Self-Reported - Is it easy or hard for you to make friends with kids your own age?

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Self-Reported - During the last week, how much of the time: Did you feel sick and tired?

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Self-Reported - As a result of my treatment, I expect: To be free from pain or disability as an adult.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Self-Reported - How much pain have you had during the last week?

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Self-Reported - During the last week, how much did pain interfere with your normal activities (including at home, outside of the home, and at school)?

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Self-Reported - Pain/comfort core scale.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PODCI Adolescent Self-Reported Version - Pain or Discomfort Interfere With Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Self-Reported - Can you participate in competitive level sports with other kids the same age (For example: hockey, basketball, soccer, football, baseball, swimming, running [track or cross country], gymnastics, or dance)?

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Self-Reported - Can you participate in recreational outdoor activities with other kids the same age (For example: bicycling, skating, hiking, jogging)?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PODCI Adolescent Self-Reported Version - Participate in Outdoor Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Self-Reported - Can you participate in pickup games or sports with other kids the same age (For example: tag, dodge ball, basketball, softball, soccer, catch, jump rope, touch football, hop scotch)?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PODCI Adolescent Self-Reported Version - Participate in Pickup Games
